Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
The VendingMachine class represents a vending machine that dispenses items and accepts payments. It contains an array of item slots, tracks the total money inserted, money earned, and available change denominations.

  • Constructor Details

    • VendingMachine

      public VendingMachine()
      Constructs a new VendingMachine object with default initial values. The vending machine will have 10 item slots, each initialized to an empty ItemSlot. The moneyTotal and moneyEarned will be set to 0, and the changeDenominations array will be initialized with 0 values.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(String name, double price, int calories, String imageFilename)
      Adds an item to the vending machine's item slots. If an empty slot is available, the item will be added. If all slots are occupied, the item will not be added.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to add.
      price - The price of the item to add.
      calories - The number of calories in the item.
      imageFilename - The filename of the image associated with the item.
